name: LANDOVER AVIATION BUSINESS SCHOOL
about: Landover Aviation Business School, located in Ikeja, Lagos, Nigeria, boasts over 15 years of experience in aviation training, with a strong focus on excellence and success. As an Authorized Training Center (ATC) certified by IATA, the school offers a range of courses, including Aircraft Marshalling and Ramp operations. With a commitment to providing high-quality education, Landover Aviation Business School has established itself as a reputable institution in the aviation industry, catering to the needs of both individuals and organizations. The school is dedicated to nurturing professionals who are equipped to meet the evolving demands of the aviation sector.
